body_html:
Does setting stride_cols to 1 work?

This question might actually be more appropriate for the StackOverflow community. There's a lot of amazing people on there who offer community-driven support we don't have the cycles to give. We try to keep this issue tracker focused on bugs and feature requests.

body:
Does setting stride_cols to 1 work?

This question might actually be more appropriate for the [StackOverflow](http://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/tensorflow) community. There's a lot of amazing people on there who offer community-driven support we don't have the cycles to give. We try to keep this issue tracker focused on bugs and feature requests.
